lead_paragraph: Mass shootings involving high-powered weapons, rising anxiety about domestic terrorism, and killings of and by police officers have emboldened the party.

headline.print_headline: Gun Laws, Long Avoided, Return to the Agenda
headline.main: After Years of Setbacks, Democrats Again See Gun Control as a Winning Issue

snippet: Mass shootings involving high-powered weapons, rising anxiety about domestic terrorism, and killings of and by police officers have emboldened the party....
abstract: Carl Hulse On Washington column remarks on how significant it is that gun control has been featured so prominently at Democratic National Convention, in light of how it has been treated as political poison by Democrats for two decades; notes Hillary Clinton is expected to make stronger gun control laws priority in her acceptance speech at convention, indication of how Democrats believe issue can be winning one in general election.
